info.title: PayNow Webhook Definitions
info.description: Webhook event specifications triggered by the PayNow API. These events are sent to your configured webhook URLs and contain event data such as orders, refunds, and subscription changes. Each webhook below represents an event type that your application can subscribe to.

id.description: The Flake ID of the Checkout
The ID of the Checkout line

product_id.description: The Product Flake ID of the Checkout Line

product_version_id.description: The Product Version Flake ID of the Checkout Line

metadata.description: Metadata associated with the Checkout Line

id.description: The Flake ID of the Customer
The Flake ID of the Game Server

name.description: The name of the Game Server

enabled.description: Indicates if the Game Server is enabled

id.description: The Flake ID of the Order

store_id.description: The Flake ID of the store associated with the order

checkout_id.description: The Flake ID of the Checkout associated with the order

subscription_id.description: The Flake ID of the Subscription associated with the order

coupon_id.description: The Flake ID of the Coupon associated with the order

currency.description: The ISO-4217 Currency Code of the order

tax_inclusive.description: Indicates if the order value was inclusive of tax

tax_amount.description: The tax amount, represented as cents

discount_amount.description: The discount amount, represented as cents

subtotal_amount.description: The subtotal amount, represented as cents

total_amount.description: The total amount, represented as cents

created_at.description: Indicates when the order was created

completed_at.description: Indicates when the order was completed

billing_name.description: The billing name of the customer associated with the order

billing_email.description: The billing email address of the customer associated with the order

billing_address_country.description: The ISO-3316 Country Code of the customer associated with the order

customer_ip.description: The IPv4 or IPv6 Address of the associated customer when creating the order

giftcard_usage_amount.description: The total amount of giftcard usage associated with the order, represented in cents

lines.description: The order lines associated with the order

product_names.description: A comma-seperated string of the names of the product associated with the order

product_tags.description: A comma-seperated string of the tags of the products associated with the order

product_gameservers.description: A comma-seperated string of the gameservers of the product associated with the order
product_gameservers.example: game server one, game server two

status.description: The status of the Order.  Possbile options: created, completed, canceled

id.description: The Flake ID of the Order Line

checkout_line_id.description: The Flake ID of the Checkout Line associated with this Order Line

product_id.description: The Flake ID of the Product ID associated with this Order Line

product_version_id.description: The Flake ID of the Product Version ID associated with this Order Line

product_name.description: The name of the product associated with this Order Line

product_image_url.description: The Image URL of the Product associated with this Order Line

subscription_id.description: The Flake ID of the Subscription associated with this Order Line

subscription_interval_value.description: The value of the interval in which the subscription associated with this Order Line renews at

subscription_interval_scale.description: The value of the scale in which the subscription associated with this Order Line renews at

trial_id.description: The Flake ID of the Trial associated with this Order Line

price.description: The price of the Order Line

quantity.description: The quantity of the Order Line

discount_amount.description: The discount amount of the order line, represented in cents

subtotal_amount.description: The subtotal amount of the order line, represented in cents

tax_amount.description: The tax amount of the order line, represented in cents

total_amount.description: The total amount of the order line, represented in cents

selected_gameserver_id.description: The Flake ID of which was the selected Game Server ID for the Order Line

stage.description: The stage of which the Product Command should be executed.  Possible options: on_purchase, on_expire, on_refund, on_renew, on_chargeback, on_trial_start, on_trial_expire

online_only.description: Indicated if the command should be executed only when the customer is online

id.description: The Flake ID of the Product

store_id.description: The Flake ID of the Store

version_id.description: The Flake ID of the Version of the Product

image_url.description: The Image URL of the product

slug.description: The URL-Friendly Slug of the Product

enabled.description: Indicates if the product is enabled.

sort_order.description: The sort order of the product

price.description: The price of the product, represented in cents.

single_game_server_only.description: Indicates if the customer must select a single game server when purchasing the product

allow_one_time_purchase.description: Indicates if one-time purchases are supported on the product

allow_subscription.description: Indicates if subscriptions are supported on the product

subscription_interval_value.description: The value of the interval in which the product subscription renews at

subscription_interval_scale.description: The value of the interval in which the product subscription renews at

remove_after_enabled.description: Indicates whether automatic removal is enabled

remove_after_time_value.description: The value of the time in which this product should be removed

remove_after_time_scale.description: The scale of the time in which this product should be removed

tags.description: The tags associated with the product

tag_names.description: A comma-seperated string of all the tags associated with the product

gameservers.description: The game servers associated with the product

gameserver_names.description: A comma-seperated string of all the game servers associated with the product

commands.description: The commands associated with the product

updated_at.description: When the product was last updated

id.description: The ID of the Game Server

name.description: The name of the Game Server

enabled.description: Indicates if the Game Server is enabled

id.description: The Flake ID of the Product Tag

slug.description: The URL-Friendly slug of the Product Tag

name.description: The name of the Product Tag

id.description: SteamID64

name.description: The name on the Steam Profile

post.summary: Triggered when a subscription is renewed

event_id.description: The ID of the Webhook Event

id.description: The Flake ID of the Subscription

store_id.description: The Flake ID of the Store associated with the Subscription

customer_id.description: The Flake ID of the Customer associated with the Subscription

billing_email.description: The billing email address of the customer associated with the Subscription

subtotal_amount.description: The subtotal amount of the Subscription represented in cents

tax_amount.description: The tax amount of the Subscription represented in cents

discount_amount.description: The discount amount applied to the Subscription represented in cents

total_amount.description: The total amount of the Subscription represented in cents

currency.description: The currency code of the Subscription

interval_value.description: The interval value of the billing cycle

interval_scale.description: The interval scale of the billing cycle

product_id.description: The Flake ID of the Product associated with the Subscription

product_version_id.description: The Flake ID of the Product Version associated with the Subscription

product_name.description: The name of the Product associated with the Subscription

product_image_url.description: The image URL of the Product associated with the Subscription

billing_country.description: The ISO-3166 country code of customer associated with the Subscription

initial_subtotal_amount.description: The initial subtotal amount of the Subscription represented in cents

initial_tax_amount.description: The initial tax amount of the Subscription represented in cents

initial_discount_amount.description: The initial discount amount applied to the Subscription represented in cents

initial_giftcard_usage_amount.description: The initial gift card usage amount applied to the Subscription represented in cents

initial_total_amount.description: The initial total amount of the Subscription represented in cents

customer_ip.description: The IP address of the Customer

current_period_start.description: The start date of the current billing period

current_period_end.description: The end date of the current billing period

created_at.description: The date and time when the Subscription was created

active_at.description: Indicates when the subscription was active

checkout_id.description: The Flake ID of the Checkout associated with the Subscription

checkout_line_id.description: The Flake ID of the Checkout Line associated with the Subscription

status.description: The current status of the Subscription.  Possible options: created, active, canceled

post.summary: Triggered when a chargeback is created

event_id.description: The ID of the Webhook Event

id.description: The Flake ID of the Payment associated with the Payment

store_id.description: The Flake ID of the Store associated with the Payment

order_id.description: The Flake ID of the Order associated with Payment

gateway.description: The Payment Gateway of the Payment

currency.description: The ISO-4217 Currency Code of the Payment

tax_inclusive.description: Indicates if the payment was Tax Inclusive

amount.description: The payment amount, represented in cents

gateway_fee_amount.description: The gateway fee  amount, represented in cents

tax_amount.description: The tax amount, represented in cents

platform_fee_amount.description: The platform fee amount, represented in cents

store_net_amount.description: The net amount recieved by the associated store, represented in cents

chargeback_at.description: Indicated when a chargeback was opened for the payment

post.summary: Triggered when a chargeback is resolved

event_id.description: The ID of the Webhook Event

id.description: The Flake ID of the Payment associated with the Payment

store_id.description: The Flake ID of the Store associated with the Payment

order_id.description: The Flake ID of the Order associated with Payment

gateway.description: The Payment Gateway of the Payment

currency.description: The ISO-4217 Currency Code of the Payment

tax_inclusive.description: Indicates if the payment was Tax Inclusive

amount.description: The payment amount, represented in cents

gateway_fee_amount.description: The gateway fee  amount, represented in cents

tax_amount.description: The tax amount, represented in cents

platform_fee_amount.description: The platform fee amount, represented in cents

store_net_amount.description: The net amount recieved by the associated store, represented in cents

chargeback_at.description: Indicated when a chargeback was opened for the payment

post.summary: Triggered when a Discord account is successfully linked to a checkout.

event_id.description: The ID of the Webhook Event

store_id.description: The Flake ID of the Store associated with the Checkout

customer_id.description: The Flake ID of the Customer associated with the Checkout

checkout_id.description: The Flake ID of the Checkout

checkout_line_id.description: The Flake ID of the Checkout Line

order_id.description: The Flake ID of the Order associated with the Checkout

discord_user_id.description: The Discord User ID of the linked account

discord_user_name.description: The Discord username of the linked account

discord_user_avatar_hash.description: The Discord avatar hash of the linked account

product_id.description: The Flake ID of the Product associated with the Checkout

product_version_id.description: The Flake ID of the Product Version associated with the Checkout

enqueued_at.description: Indicates when the Discord account link was enqueued

post.summary: Triggered when a delivery item is added to the customers inventory

event_id.description: The ID of the Webhook Event

id.description: The Flake ID of the Delivery Item

store_id.description: The Flake ID of the Store associated with the Delivery Item

order_customer_id.description: The Flake ID of the customer who ordered the delivery item - which may differ to the customer because of gifting

checkout_id.description: The Flake ID of the Checkout associated with the Delivery Item

order_id.description: The Flake ID of the Order ID associated with the Delivery Item

order_line_id.description: The Flake Id of the Order Line ID associated with the Delivery Item

subscription_id.description: The Flake ID of the Subscription associated with the Delivery Item

execute_on_gameserver_id.description: The Flake ID of the Game Server the Delivery Item is associated with

product_id.description: The associated Product ID of the Delivery Item

product_version_id.description: The associated Product Version ID of the Delivery Item

state.description: The state of the Delivery Item.  Possible options: usable, active, used, revoked, renewed

added_at.description: Indicates when the Delivery Item was added to the customers inventory

active_at.description: Indicates when the Delivery Item become active

expires_at.description: Indicates when the Delivery Item expires

removed_at.description: Indicates when the Delivery Item was removed from the customers inventory

revoked_at.description: Indicates when the Delivery Item was revoked from the customers inventory

revoke_reason.description: Indicates the reason the delivery item was revoked from the customers inventory

post.summary: Triggered when an order is completed

event_id.description: The ID of the Webhook Event

id.description: The Flake ID of the Order

store_id.description: The Flake ID of the store associated with the order

checkout_id.description: The Flake ID of the Checkout associated with the order

subscription_id.description: The Flake ID of the Subscription associated with the order

coupon_id.description: The Flake ID of the Coupon associated with the order

currency.description: The ISO-4217 Currency Code of the order

tax_inclusive.description: Indicates if the order value was inclusive of tax

tax_amount.description: The tax amount, represented as cents

discount_amount.description: The discount amount, represented as cents

subtotal_amount.description: The subtotal amount, represented as cents

total_amount.description: The total amount, represented as cents

created_at.description: Indicates when the order was created

completed_at.description: Indicates when the order was completed

billing_name.description: The billing name of the customer associated with the order

billing_email.description: The billing email address of the customer associated with the order

billing_address_country.description: The ISO-3316 Country Code of the customer associated with the order

customer_ip.description: The IPv4 or IPv6 Address of the associated customer when creating the order

giftcard_usage_amount.description: The total amount of giftcard usage associated with the order, represented in cents

lines.description: The order lines associated with the order

product_names.description: A comma-seperated string of the names of the product associated with the order

product_tags.description: A comma-seperated string of the tags of the products associated with the order

product_gameservers.description: A comma-seperated string of the gameservers of the product associated with the order
product_gameservers.example: game server one, game server two

status.description: The status of the Order.  Possbile options: created, completed, canceled

post.summary: Triggered when a refund is completed

event_id.description: The ID of the Webhook Event

id.description: The Flake ID of the Refund

store_id.description: The Flake ID of the store associated with the Refund

order_id.description: The Flake ID of Order associated with the refund

payment_id.description: The Flake ID of the Payment associated with the refund

gateway.description: The Payment Gateway associated with the refund

currency.description: The ISO-4217 Currency Code of the Payment

tax_inclusive.description: Indicates if taxes were inclusive in the associated payment

amount.description: The initial payment amount, represented in cents

gateway_fee_amount.description: The initial gateway fee amount, represented in cents

tax_amount.description: The initial tax amount, represented in cents

platform_fee_amount.description: The initial platform fee amount, represented in cents

store_net_amount.description: The initial store net amount, represented in cents

store_refund_amount.description: The amount refunded to the store, represented in cents

created_at.description: Indicates when the refund was created

approved_at.description: Indicates when the refund was approved

pending_at.description: Indicates when the refund was pending

completed_at.description: Indicates when the refund was completed

billing_email.description: The email address of the intial payment customer

status.description: The status of the refund.  Possible options: created, approved, processing, completed, canceled, failed

checkout_id.description: The Flake ID of the Checkout associated with the Trial

checkout_line_id.description: The Flake ID of the Checkout Line associated with the Trial

product_id.description: The Flake ID of the Product associated with the Trial

product_version_id.description: The Flake ID of the Product Version associated with the Trial

product_name.description: The name of the Product associated with the Trial

product_image_url.description: The image URL of the Product associated with the Trial

period_value.description: The period value of the Trial

period_scale.description: The period scale of the Trial

starts_at.description: The start date of the Trial

ends_at.description: The end date of the Trial

status.description: The current status of the Trial.  Possible options: created, active, canceled, completed

created_at.description: The date and time when the Trial was created

canceled_at.description: Indicates when the Trial was canceled
